_meta.title: forest_a six baselines, 20 runs, grouped figures (MPC2 tracking)
_meta.summary: Evaluate A*, A*-MPC2, Hybrid A*, Hybrid A*-MPC2, RRT*, and RRT-MPC2 on forest_a with 20 random runs and grouped path/control figures.
notes: Baseline tracker switched to mpc2 via forest_baseline_controller=mpc2.
Random start-goal reachability filtering uses Hybrid A* via --rand-reject-policy hybrid_astar.
Grouped figures are exported in 4-run chunks, expected 5 path groups + 5 control groups for 20 runs.
Metric outputs remain table2_kpis_mean.csv and baseline_tracking_failures.csv for direct comparison with MPC baseline.
